conversation.text: Dude, have you ever seen this anime Unlimited Expressioner Z?
It totally sucks but I've watched like three seasons of it.

It's like a reverse harem send-up where this dude who dresses like a girl gets blackmailed into working as a teacher at an all-boys high school by his jilted ex-lover, but then it turns out all of the boys in his class are actually girls too.
